desc: Wellesley Equestrian is the leader in high-end luxury equestrian products and gifts. Shop personalized show brushes, equestrian gifts, gifts for horse lovers and more!

layout.text:
April 21st, 2022
Wellesley Equestrian has been a personal mission these last 5 years to bring exceptional products to the horse community. Since our inception we have created over 2,000 brushes, been a sponsor of the USEF Pony Finals, featured in USEF Magazine, and been welcomed by so many barn families across the USA.
In Q1 2022 we had an unexpected personal situation arise. We will therefore will be temporarily closing Wellesley Equestrian for the remainder of 2022 to focus on our family. All orders through 4/21 will be fulfilled. We thank you for your unwavering support of our business and look forward to working with you at a later date.
